CustomField.formula: IF(fw1__Domain_Name__c != NULL , "https://"+fw1__Domain_Name__c+"/fw1__PaymentReceiptPDF?pyid="+Id+ IF(fw1__Invoice__r.Id != null, "&id="+fw1__Invoice__r.Id, null), "/apex/fw1__PaymentReceiptPDF?pyid="+Id+IF(fw1__Invoice__r.Id != null, "&id="+fw1__Invoice__r.Id, null))
CustomField.label: Payment Receipt PDF Link
